sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
steady
, se nadaljuje ali razvija postopoma, brez prekinitev ali nenadnih sprememb.

seg.quote: These vehicles are reasonably economical at a steady 56 mph.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki predmet
steady
, je čvrst in se ne premika naokoli.

seg.quote: His hand was not quite steady.

sense.def:
Pogled ali glas, ki je
steady
, je miren in obvladan.

seg.quote: Her voice was faint but steady.
Foster looked steadily at me for some moments.

sense.def:
Delo, ki je
steady
, se bo gotovo nadaljevalo dolgo časa.

seg.quote: My son has a steady job.

sense.def:
Kdor je
steady
, je razumen in zanesljiv.

seg.quote: I like Simon very much—he's a very steady boy.

sense.def:
To steady something
pomeni preprečiti, da bi se nekaj treslo ali premikalo.

seg.quote: His elbows were resting on his knees to steady the binoculars.
The boat moved slightly, then steadied.

sense.def:
To steady oneself
pomeni obvladati in pomiriti se.

seg.quote: He drew a deep breath to steady himself.
